Neruga Chief Tantus:
Tejakar Pa'agrio! Praise the name of the Flame! This Immortal Plateau has been our sacred ground from ancient times, but while I, Tantus, was living among Humans of the Kingdom of Elmore, foreign invaders and Orc traitors brought disgrace to this land!
Now I am back, and I will not forgive those who disgraced our sacred place!
